Method Detail

register

android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,android.drm.DrmInfo> register()
Registers with the DRM server. Registration must occur before performing most other DRM requests.

canHandle

boolean canHandle(Source source)
Checks whether the given source can be handled by the DRM framework.

acquireRights

android.os.AsyncTask<Source,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer> acquireRights(Source source)
Acquires rights for the given source.

checkRightsStatus

android.os.AsyncTask<Source,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer> checkRightsStatus(Source source)
Checks whether the given Source has valid rights for DrmStore.Action.DEFAULT. The task's return value is an int representing the DrmStore.RightsStatus of the content.

checkRightsStatus

android.os.AsyncTask<Source,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer> checkRightsStatus(Source source,
                                                                                int action)
Checks whether the given Source has valid rights for a given DrmStore.Action.

removeRights

android.os.AsyncTask<Source,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer> removeRights(Source source)
Removes rights for the given Source.

removeAllRights

android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer> removeAllRights()
Removes rights for all sources managed by the plugin.

release

void release()
Releases resources associated with the current session. It is considered good practice to call this method when the plugin is no longer needed in your application. After release() is called, the plugin is no longer usable since it has lost all of its required resources.

getConstraints

android.content.ContentValues getConstraints(Source source)
Returns ContentValues describing the given Source's constraints for the default action.

getConstraints

android.content.ContentValues getConstraints(Source source,
                                             int action)
Returns ContentValues describing the given Source's constraints for the given action.

getLicenseStartTime

int getLicenseStartTime(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns the license start time ago in seconds. Returns -1 if there are no rights.

getLicenseExpiryTime

int getLicenseExpiryTime(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns the license expiry time in seconds. Returns -1 if there are no rights.

getLicenseAvailableTime

int getLicenseAvailableTime(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns the remaining time on the license in seconds. Returns -1 if there are no rights.

getLicenseType

DrmPlugin.LicenseType getLicenseType(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns the license type. E.g. STREAMING, OFFLINE, BOTH, UNKNOWN.

getLicenseResolution

DrmPlugin.LicenseResolution getLicenseResolution(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns the license resolution. E.g. SD, HD, BOTH, UNKNOWN.

getLastError

java.lang.String getLastError(android.content.ContentValues contentValues)
Returns an error string describing the reason for the last license acquisition error for this asset. If no error, returns "ok". Defaults to an empty String.

getDrmManagerClient

android.drm.DrmManagerClient getDrmManagerClient()
Gets the underlying DrmManagerClient. Use this is if you need finer access to the Android DRM Framework.

setOnErrorListener

void setOnErrorListener(android.drm.DrmManagerClient.OnErrorListener errorListener)
Sets the OnErrorListener

setOnEventListener

void setOnEventListener(android.drm.DrmManagerClient.OnEventListener eventListener)
Sets the OnEventListener

setOnInfoListener

void setOnInfoListener(android.drm.DrmManagerClient.OnInfoListener infoListener)
Sets the OnInfoListener
